data.meanings: Becoming distant, remote, far off, aloof or far awayRemoved, retired, withdrew to a distanceAlienated, estranged, wide separation, great distancePossessing judgment and prudence, penetrating, effective judgment, depth or far reaching judgmentGo or going a great length or far in hostility.
data.sentence: The word بَعْدُ comes from the root ب ع د and is associated with the meanings: Becoming distant, remote, far off, aloof or far awayRemoved, retired, withdrew to a distanceAlienated, estranged, wide separation, great distancePossessing judgment and prudence, penetrating, effective judgment, depth or far reaching judgmentGo or going a great length or far in hostility.

data.meanings: sank, drowned, went downwards and disappeared, became without need, drew the bow to the full (with vehement fulling), outstripped, engrossed, a man overwhelmed by trials, single draught, ornamented, obligatory
data.sentence: The word أَغْرَقْنَا comes from the root غ ر ق and is associated with the meanings: sank, drowned, went downwards and disappeared, became without need, drew the bow to the full (with vehement fulling), outstripped, engrossed, a man overwhelmed by trials, single draught, ornamented, obligatory

data.sentence: The word الْبَاقِينَ comes from the root ب ق ي and is associated with the meanings: Something or someone that remains, continues, lasts and/or enduresPerpetual or permanentExisting, incessantly, always, endlessly or foreverWatching, observing, guarding or preservingPardoning, leaving, showing mercy or sparingRemaining portion, remainder, remnant, relic, residue, remains, recompense
